Translations.Text: hyeonseeseo jeulgyeossdeon hyanglag-i geu deul-ege yuyonghaji anihadeola
hananim-i gyeong-gojaleul bonaessdeon go-euldeul-eul myeolmangke hayeo
gyohun-i doedolog hayeoss-eudoe u lineun gyeolko geudeul-eul beolham-e budangha ji ani haessnola
satan-i geugeos-eul gajigo o ji ani haess-eumyeo
geugeos-eun geudeul-ege jeoghabha ji anihago geuleohge hal neunglyeogdo eobs nola
geudeul-eun geugeos-eul deudneun gi hoejochado je-oedoeeo iss-eossnola
hananim oee daleun sin-eul sung baehaji balla geuleohji anihamyeon neo huido beol-eul badneun ja jung-e issge doe lila
geudaeui chincheogdeul-ege gyeong-gohala
midneunja jung-eseo geudaeleul ttaleu neun ja-egeneun geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
geudeul-i geudaeege geoyeoghanda myeon illeogalodoe sillo naneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun il-e chaeg-im-i eobsnola
jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasin bun ege uijihala
geubun-eun yebaehagi wihae hollo seo issneun geudaeleul bogo gyesimyeo
geudaega eopdeulyeo yebaehaneun ja deul jung-e iss-eul ttaedo bogo gyesinani
sillo geubun-eun deul-eusimgwa asim eulo chungmanhasim-ila
illeogalodoe satandeul-i nugu ege naelyeooneunji neohuiege illeojuliyo
geudeul-eun geojishago saaghan modeun jadeul-ege naelyeo ol ppun-ila
geudeul-eun gwileul giul-ina geudeuldaedasuneun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
siindeul-eun saagsog-eseo bang hwanghamyeo geudeul-eul ttaleuneun jadeul-ila
geudeul-i modeun gyegog-eseo iseong-eul ilhgo banghwanghaneun geos-eul neohuineun boji anhhaessneunyo
geudeul-eun geudeul-i haenghajido anihan geos-eul malhago issnola

geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghamyeo hangsang hananim-eul yeom-wonhago baghaeleul bad-eun huedo seuseuloleul bo hohaneun jadeul-eun je-oela saaghan haeng wileul jeojileun jadeul-eun geudeul-i dol-a gal choehuui unmyeong-i mueos-inji alge doenila
